description:
Tree works in the Aberdeen Park Conservation Area

X1 Horse Chestnut on the footpath at the border of 59-61 Aberdeen Park - Re pollard.
X1 Horse Chestnut on the footpath outside of 55 Aberdeen Park - Re pollard.
X1 Horse Chestnut on the footpath outside of 49 Aberdeen Park - Re pollard.
X1 Horse Chestnut on the footpath at the border of 37-39 Aberdeen Park - Re pollard.
X1 Cherry on the footpath outside Escuan Lodge - Thin by a Maximum of of 25%.
X1 Norway Maple on the footpath outside Escuan Lodge - Remove co-dominant stem.
X1 Gleditsia on the footpath outside 140 Aberdeen Park - Thin by 25% and lift above streetlight.
x1 Ash on the footpath outside 128-130  Aberdeen Park - Crown lift by 2m           
X1 Horse Chestnut on the footpath at the border of 67-69 Aberdeen Park - Re pollard.
x1 Oak on the footpath outside the woodlands - Crown lift by 2m.
x1 Cherry on the footpath outside the woodlands - Crown lift by 2m, crown thin by 25%.
X1 Rowan outside No. 51 Aberdeen Park -Crown lift by 2m, crown thin by 25%.
X1 Gleditsia outside No. 43 Aberdeen Park -Crown lift by 2m, crown thin by 25%.
